title: Adi Godrej
deleted: In an interview at the [[Harvard Business School]], Godrej describes his beliefs about corporate social responsibility and explains how the [[Godrej Group]] has been involved with philanthropic activities.<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.hbs.edu/businesshistory/emerging-markets/pages/profile-detail.aspx?profile=agodrejGodrej |title=Interview with Adi Godrej |website=Creating Emerging Markets |publisher=Harvard Business School}}</ref> Godrej Group is a  supporter of [[WWF-India]], it has developed a green business campus in the Vikhroli township of Mumbai, which includes a {{convert|150|acre|km2|adj=on}} mangrove forest and a school for the children of company employees.{{citation needed|date=October 2020}}
